name: Chompus
description:
This is a bit hard for a clicker game, but I think it still qualifies as one due to all the clicking. Its just not a very relaxing one. It's also heavily based on RNG, so you could get easily screwed over by mummies.

After awhile of play testing I think it has become balanced. I am able to occasionally reach 100k+. Although it is difficult to do still.

I had to disable the full screen button on the web version due to full screen breaking all the text objects. This doesn't occur for me on the windows build though so if you want to try full screen go for the downloads.

This was made for 

Clicker Jam Spring 2023
